KW 0.6.0
  • Reference

Performing CV using svm

svm_cv.Rd

Performing CV using svm

svm_cv(cv_obj)

Arguments

cv_obj

outputs of the cvPartition function

Author

Kevin Wang

Examples

x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
cv_obj = cv_partition(x = x, y = y, nfolds = 5)
svm_cv(cv_obj)
